S06bsu053_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvasaṃghena /
S06bsu053_u:2_1: tena khalu samayena bhagavān gambhīrāvasaṃbodhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S06bsu053_u:2_2: tena ca samayena āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S06bsu053_u:3_0: athāyuṣmān śāriputro buddhānubhāvena āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścit kulaputro [vā kuladuhitā vā asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ cartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu053_u:3_1_0: kathaṃ śikṣitavyaḥ? evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ
S06bsu053_u:3_1_1: śāriputrametadavocat - yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā [asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ
S06bsu053_u:3_2: tenaivaṃ vyavalokitavyam - pañca skandhāṃstāṃśca svabhāvaśūnyān samanupaśyati sma /
S06bsu053_u:3_3: rūpaṃ śūnyatā, śūnyataiva rūpam / rūpānna pṛthak śūnyatā, śūnyatāyā na pṛthag rūpam / yadrūpaṃ sā śūnyatā, yā śūnyatā tadrūpam / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni ca śūnyatā /
S06bsu053_u:3_4: evaṃ śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇā anutpannā aniruddhā amalā vimalā anūnā asaṃpūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu053_u:3_6: na vedanā, sa saṃjñā, na saṃskārāḥ, na vijñānam, na cakṣurna śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na mano na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmaḥ /
S06bsu053_u:3_8: na vidyā nāvidyā na kṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayaḥ,
S06bsu053_u:3_9: na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptirnāprāptiḥ /
S06bsu053_u:3_14: tasmād jñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāmahāmantraḥ anuttaramantraḥ asamasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanamantraḥ satyamamithyatvāt prajñāpāramitāyāmukto mantraḥ /
S06bsu053_u:3_15: tadyathā - gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā /
S06bsu053_u:3_16: evaṃ śāriputra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena /
S06bsu053_u:4_0: atha khalu bhagavān tasmātsamādhervyutthāya āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu053_u:4_1: evametat kulaputra, evametad gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryaṃ cartavyaṃ yathā tvayā nirdiṣṭam /
S06bsu053_u:5_0: idamavocadbhagavān / ānandamanā āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āryāvalokiteśvaraśca bodhisattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī pariṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
